1100001001000111 1001011010011011 1 -> sum: 0101100011100011, cout: 1

0100001011110010 0111110011101111 0 -> sum: 1011111111100001, cout: 0

1010001000000000 1000101010110010 0 -> sum: 0010110010110010, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
